meaningMnemonic: You've learned 微 can mean "delicate," but it can also mean <kanji>tiny</kanji>. Combine that with 生物, which you might remember is "living thing," and what do you get? A tiny living thing…? Well, that's a <vocabulary>microorganism</vocabulary>. The tiniest kind of living thing there is.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
